About Me

Let me introduce myself...

BIO

Hello, I am GD,
I work at Trabacus Technologies.
I am a Coder, Engineer and TCS-Intern
I love Computers and latest Technologies,
also like Marathon-Running, Trekking & GYM.

Software Developer at Trabacus Technologies.

Working as Full-Stack Python Developer (Aug 19- to date).

At Trabacus Technologies, we are building solutions for the Travel and Hospitality Industries using ERP system for travel agencies and tour operators.
I work with Python-Framework Odoo-ERP System, building Backend-Solutions mostly and frontend-QWeb Templating Engine too, using XML, Python.
I am working on product HotelsCentric, which is All-in-one Platform for Hotels an Property Management.

Intern at Tata Consultancy Services.

Worked on Full-Stack JavaScript Development (Jun 18- Sept 18).

I Completed an Internship in Tata Consultancy Services, for 3 months.
I worked on latest Technologies like Full-Stack JavaScript Development, in MERN Stack as MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS.
Learned Git-Version Control System, Bootstrap, Software Development Life Cycle.
Hosted project on Heroku-MLab Cloud Platform.

BE from Mumbai-University

Specialization in Information Technology (July 15- June 19).

I completed Engineering with CGPA 8/10, from
DY-Patil's RAIT College.
I studied Data Structures & Algorithms Analysis, Open Source Technologies, Object-Oriented Programming, Mathematics, Database Management System, Machine Learning, Computer Networks, Operating Systems.
Also, I practiced Competitive Coding on LeetCode and System Design.

Student at StackOverflow.

Self-helped & Online learning Student (Apr 17- to date).

StackOverflow is a platform to Ask/Answer/Discuss/Learn/Explain about technologies, Coding practices, code-review, Errors-in-code.
I spend my leisure time on it, to read and solve others' doubts, which gives reputation points if answer is helpful.
My StackOverflow and AskUbuntu total reputation is 1050+ points.

Regards Ganesh Deshmukh.
